definition: and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs

sentences.english: Chu and all the tenants initiative, hear all buyers hedge try.
sentences.chinese: 楚慈和衆租客倡議買樓保值，聽得衆人躍躍欲試。

sentences.english: Jesus wants you to live an extraordinary life, full of grace and truth.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌希望你活出非凡的生命，滿有恩慈和真理。

sentences.english: Mercy and truth have met together, righteousness and bliss shall kiss one another.
sentences.chinese: 恩慈和真理已經相遇，公義與極樂亦將互吻。

definition: kind brows, pleasant eyes (idiom); amiable looking/benign-faced
kind brows, pleasant eyes (idiom); amiable looking/benign-faced
